website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat the simplicity, flavor, and healthiness of providing your cat with cuts of real Alaskan salmon that are high in natural nutrition.
pros: Only 1 ingredient: 100% pure wild Alaskan salmon
Excellent source of omega 3’s, B-vitamins and selenium
Can be rehydrated in water for softer treat
cons: You may need to crumble and tear these salmon chunks down to a smaller size that a cat can manage
Treats do not always stay fresh after bag is opened

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before!
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my cats favorite treats but after the change in packaging and new recipe, they refuse to eat it. My cats used go crazy trying to eat it out of my hand when I would break it into little pieces but now one cat just sniffs it and walk away and the second cat spits it out after putting it in his mouth. The pieces used to be very dry, white cubes and now are greasy, pink flat shapes. It also appears the other flavor my cats liked, beef, is no longer available. Did the company get bought out or something?
customer_reviews.author: Meerkat154

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA! One ingredient!
customer_reviews.text: Just one ingredient....salmon! How awesome is that?!? Oh wait, it’s made in the USA so that’s even more awesome! It’s not expensive so that’s even more awesomer! 😃🤣 I have 2 kittens about 4 months old, one really likes this and the other one is not sure if he’s supposed to eat it or smack it around. They’re still figuring out what kind of food they like, but I think it’s important to know what’s in your pets food and where it comes from so I really like this product. Thank you Whole Life Pet for caring about my cats as much as I do 😍
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was buying a much more expensive brand and thought I'd try this instead. One of my cats is quite picky, but she loves it. It contains only one ingredient - salmon. The cubes are easy to break up, which is how I use it. I sprinkle it on their food as an extra treat once a day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Moirao

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are only one ingredient and natural. My cats love these treats and it makes me feel good knowing that they are getting something that is good, not all processed. I use them in treat puzzles, or just crumble over their other wet food. My kitties are very happy with these treats and look forward to that little extra treat. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Good value horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: My non-picky male cat will eat them, but my picky female cat won’t go near them. Got the Salmon, it’s so rank and fishy that I have to wash my hands with soap to remove the scent from my fingertips. Makes me curious about the meat being close to rancid prior to freeze-drying. But single-ingredient dried meats are the better choice when picking snacks (less additives, less allergenic) as long as your kitty is able to stay hydrated enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A Knock off???
customer_reviews.text: I typically love these exact treats but have only ever bought them from the store. I received this in the mail and I noticed that the material was a bit different, and some of the fonts looked odd. i figured it was just older packaging or something but I opened it up, and there were a couple giant chunks of slightly moist salmon when typically these come in smaller pieces, completely dry. There was no way I was feeding that to my cat. This kind of seemed like a weird knock off and grossed me out.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help administer pills for my cat. My cat is on prednisone and I put the pill inside a "Lean Treat" brand soft treat, mold the treat around the pill then take this freeze dried salmon and crush some into a powder and roll the treat in the powder. It's like kitty crack. Works better than cat nip. My cat cries for this morning and night. I do not dare give him this outside of pill time for fear he'll realize the difference in taste and not take the pill again. I also buy the chicken and I break that apart and add water for an occasional meal. He loves this freeze dried brand.
customer_reviews.author: pattysue

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy Cody likes it!
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find dried meat....just the meat. But that's what this is....salmon. My toy poodle loves it....shh, don't tell him it's for cats ;o) He will not eat fresh fish so this gives him that variety. However if I let him have it every evening he will have soft poops. Just a warning!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Brauer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats HATE each other and the only time they tolerate each other's presence is when I bring out this bag of salmon treats they sit calmly together and eat their treats then go right back to hating each other. Two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Vilya57

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love this salmon treat - but chunks need to be broken up
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace the freeze-dried salmon treats we usually order that weren't available now (or at all). Both kitties love this product - it must have a stronger flavor and/or odor than what we usually buy. My only "issue" is that the chunks are most often large and need to be broken up, which is sometimes hard to do. I frequently have to use a knife on them - but the kitties love them. A little pricey, but they only get small amounts. They would be very happy if I left the package out in an accessible spot ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: My cat is an addict and needs rehab
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cat to try. He used to be such a good boy until we introduced these to his diet. Now, instead of laying by us all day, he sits in front of the drawer we keep these in and meows all day until we give him one. And when we do give him one, he eats it then immediately goes back to the drawer and meows for more. They’re literally like cat crack.
customer_reviews.author: Haden Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: Funny they ask to rate the flavor....like I tried them myself. But the pets seemed to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, I feel safe giving them a one ingredient treat.
customer_reviews.text: My cats go nuts over these. They are big chunks so I cut them into smaller bits. They do crumble a bit, but I put the little crumbs on their plate after. I have had at least 3 amazon bags broken into by them because they like them so much. It's crazy. Will continue purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lovecats

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: Our Ragdoll seems to recognize this bag when I take it out of the pantry! He twirls around, so happy, until I get it open and into his bowl. I serve it, cut up, on top of his kibble, about 2-3 times a week. Top quality and kitty cat approved. Nice healthy treat!
customer_reviews.author: MrsJ

customer_reviews.title: Tough to properly chew, possible choking
customer_reviews.text: Cat acted like he was choked - keep trying to cough it out but I assume that it got caught in his throat. This is a fairly large cat, part wild and has not had this problem before. He liked the taste, chews well, wasn't eating fast. Will try cutting up into smaller pieces but will not buy again. Very difficult to see a cat choking and can't do anything to help. He has fairly large teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: best cat treats ever
customer_reviews.text: our cats go wild for these. the pieces are kind of random sizes, and need to be broken down before they're given to cats (and sometimes there's long stringy bones the cats probably shouldn't ingest), but they're a favorite around here and worth the effort. we save the dust at the bottom of the bag for sprinkling on their canned food, too.
customer_reviews.author: David & Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but big chunks and a bit messy
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were way too big for my Ragdoll cat, so I had to break them into smaller pieces. Of course, since they're freeze-dried, breaking them up gets flakes and powder everywhere. I ended up giving the smaller pieces to my cat and the rest went to my dog. They both loved these treats -- just not as much as regular salmon. :) I just need something smaller for my cat in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ssm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Treat , cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Come to bed treat , shaking this package the cats come running, happy happy cats , they love it
customer_reviews.author: Cat3

customer_reviews.title: something is changed.... Cats used to love the old version
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers said, something is changed but not a good way. It used to have a great real salmon smell, but I now can smell oxidized OLD oil since the company change the package design. Cats are in general very sensitive to the smell and of course my cats decided not to eat the product. Please bring back to the old version!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Kitties scream for this!
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats start going crazy when I pull this out of the fridge. I have to keep it in there because the little rascals can pull open any drawer or cabinet I put it in. The big pieces need to be broken down so they can get it in their mouths, but I'm glad to be able to see it's really real fish.
customer_reviews.author: Matisse Norton

customer_reviews.title: Your Kitty will love it, and so will you
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this treat is that my kitty loves it! She will come to me and ask for it 5 times a day. Had to train her down to twice a day😉 I am please that it is 100% dried salmon. Best investment for our furry treasure 😻
customer_reviews.author: MomMom

customer_reviews.title: cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this freeze-dried salmon well enough. I do not like how it is chopped up--pieces vary in size, from small to large. I have to break the larger pieces apart before giving to cat.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. They are a good value except for the fact that the last 1/3 or the product always ends up as powder or tiny pieces. The first 2/3rds, though can be broken into good sizes for puzzles, fetch, or general rewards. I’ll buy the smaller bag in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this treat, they wait every moring for their two pieces of salmon. My big cat gets growly on occasion but when he is waiting on his treats I can pick up his paw and hug him no problem. You should see what happens when I am trying to get the package open (very well packaged) he is all over me trying to help :) Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Best cat treat of all time! Until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I've lived with cats all my life and before I tried this product I'd never found an effective cat treat that would make any cat come running every single time. I do have to cut the pieces down significantly - these are for cats but the chunks are dog sized - but a little goes a long way, and it makes a small package last a good while. Edited to add: One day the cats stopped eating these. Don’t know why.
customer_reviews.author: Mobaltz

customer_reviews.title: Solid large pieces of salmon
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I'm getting the most "bang for my buck" in cat treats when I get these for my cat. They are large pieces of dried salmon and don't have the messy "flakes/crumbs" that some of the other brands have. I don't know why they ask to rate "flavor" as I'm not the one eating them, but my cat loves them!
customer_reviews.author: violaplayer

customer_reviews.title: My kitties went nuts for these treats! My girl ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitties went nuts for these treats! My girl swallowed hers whole and tried to steal her brother’s piece. Then I tried to pet her she grabbed my hand and nibbled it looking for another treat. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Everard

customer_reviews.title: Cats Really, Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: I take this treat to my neighbor's house for her cat. When I arrive, the cat practically climbs up my body to get to the treats. Even her two dogs like the treat. It's expensive, but I like that it's just salmon without a bunch of unnecessary fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cats chocked on it dry.
customer_reviews.text: My cats chocked on the salmon when it was given dry. I watered it down and they were fine with it. Would not recommend or buy it. Easier to buy can salmon for cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kezan

customer_reviews.title: Human grade.
customer_reviews.text: My Bengal can’t get enough. Wish we got more and less powder. But we take what we get. Every month purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality , not enough quantity
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely loves these treats , they’re a little on the pricey due to how much the bag brings. They eat all their food when this is added as a topping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them but most came damaged!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these, but WHY in the world would you put something like this and ship it in an envelope!!! No! Most of them were crushed like powder, we ordered 3 bags, and one was like saw dust! Not cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen R Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: I must have weird cats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats as my cats love fish and these treats had no carbohydrates. When I first opened the bag, my cats were curious. My oldest cat ate a few bites then wanted nothing to do with them. My other two couldn't grasp the concept of eating large flakes. They weren't interested in the scent, either. They smelled fairly fresh. You'd think the cats would love it!!! But no. Lessoned learned.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: Best freeze dried salmon treats I've found
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! I used to but another brand that is no longer available and this is just as good, be if not better. There's a larger quantity in comparison to other brands I've previously bought and they are already in tiny pieces so it's nice not to have to break them up for her. Other brands have a tendency to be too hard and these are perfect for her tiny teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Cat goes bananas for these treats
customer_reviews.text: These are my cats favorite treats. He knows where I keep them and stands staring at it and meowing untul I give him some. He gobbles them down like it was full of catnip. I spoil my cat and have tried many treats over the years but these are his favorite. I like the fact it is all salmon..no fillers or preservatives. Very healthy treat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: One cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats won't eat canned food, only kibble and this dried salmon. But she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Berman-Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it, but pricey for what it is
customer_reviews.text: The cats like it. But the owner finds it pricey. Especially when a third of the product is just flakes. True I can put it over the kitties food, but its supposed to be treats.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Peaches loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My FIV+ kitty loves these, I love the quality, and he gets the supplement that the vet says he should have for his immunity by eating these treats everyday.
customer_reviews.author: AmberL

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied, but not upset.
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 2 cats liked the treats; normal for these two, liking the same food has become rare. They're light as a feather and smell like fish. The bag was barely halfway full which was disappointing, considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: Have a cat with allergies so she is on a special diet. She loves these. The bonus is I put her pills in these. No more trauma giving medications.
customer_reviews.author: L. D.

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for cats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat does really like the taste of these treats and comes running when she hears me open the bag. I think a lot of the chunks are a little too big for cats to eat without them being broken down first, however, breaking them into pieces creates a lot of dust. I'm not big on the idea of salmon dust being spread around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for a picky cat?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the picky cat. I think it's good and convenient. The cat is not interested. If I rehydrate and mix into food, she'll eat it. I am going to give them away
customer_reviews.author: S. Gerow

customer_reviews.title: All mine love it
customer_reviews.text: Cat treats that all they cats like which is very unusual to find anything they all like
customer_reviews.author: willy

customer_reviews.title: All my cats love this healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: All my picky cats love this treat! It is pure and simple and SO healthy for them!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Real Salmon - Kitties Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those cases where I loved it but my kitties were completely unimpressed. It is the real deal - freeze dried salmon. So healthy and good for my little rugrats but alas, they turned their noses up at it. I wanted to give this treat 5 stars but they were insistent that it was only a 1 star. We compromised and gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Skywench

customer_reviews.title: Buddha gave this flavor the paws down!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it is excellent, but alas Buddha , my ferret, was not at all interested in this flavor! ( He did, however- adore the chicken and Turkey variety' s of this brand) ! Maybe he just does not like the fishy smell! I think a cat would love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with finicky cat
customer_reviews.text: Wish the package was larger as cat goes thru a bag very quickly! So it's a hit with her and she's very picky.
customer_reviews.author: BookaholicTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.....no harmful ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it so much, I had to put the bags in a lockbox!!
customer_reviews.author: Spanky's girl

customer_reviews.title: Good, but Large Pieces
customer_reviews.text: There are large pieces for cats, but the cats enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenafur Rebecca Maher-Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only complaint is that some pueces are really lsrge and can be difficult/messy to break up.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect healthy treat for cats that they will love
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these as a treat. They get super excited when this pack comes out. And as a cat mamma I love them because it's just pure animal protein for them, no junkie additives .
customer_reviews.author: Donnamarie C

customer_reviews.title: good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super wonderful! it does not feel as stupid greasy, even the most picky cats perk up for this. good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: dolly chamness

customer_reviews.title: True love
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves Interesting texture Sizes of pieces do vary but break up easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: My cat devours these things. Love that its just straight salmon and not loaded with artificialness.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary H

customer_reviews.title: Best treats!
customer_reviews.text: Large and well loved by my cat! Best dried treats I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: tok

customer_reviews.title: Treats
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves the Salmon treats, so I suppose they have good flavor, I'm not trying them to find out
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Large sized for cat treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats look more like dog treats they are about the size of a large marble. I use scissors to cut them up into cat sized pieces. My cat likes them but straight out of the bag they have to be cut down.
customer_reviews.author: Tance

customer_reviews.title: cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: and one of my cats is super picky. Good for training
customer_reviews.author: Katya A

customer_reviews.title: Stinky to humans, but perfume to cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat thinks these treats are the best ever. A bit expensive, but no digestive issues and coat is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Phennie

customer_reviews.title: Meowza!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My cats love this stuff 😻 Simple ingredients JUST SALMON! They want more for sure 😸 They get what they want 😺
customer_reviews.author: Gina C.

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat adores these treats! Be warned they are a bit stinky - not surprising though since it is what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dar C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loved it. Pieces are quite large but easy to chew/break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Hard for my cats to resist
customer_reviews.text: They always have room for this treat! Great for a topper or a treat! My cats LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: I am Zero

customer_reviews.title: Hungry boy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our big cat who never seems to get enough food. Careful with his diet so was impressed with the limited ingredients. Was skeptical that they may not be flavorful enough for him, but he goes crazy for them. Likes them much more than the other brands of treats we have purchased. Also got chicken and he loves that too. Only complaint is that they are slightly messy. They flake a lot so I give them to him in his feeding area and sometimes put them in a dish with a splash of warm water to make them more like wet food. Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVED this! We re-hydrated the chunks in some water ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVED this! We re-hydrated the chunks in some water for a few minutes as she didn’t like the dry texture. Big chunks, great quality salmon. Will definitely buy again and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: salmon treats +cat =happy cat
customer_reviews.text: well I personally don't love it but the cat enjoys them so a good deal for her.
customer_reviews.author: 2cat mom

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater Approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat is the pickiest when it comes to treats but absolutely loves these. I haven't tried soaking them in warm water yet but he will eat them as is right out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved them but choked
customer_reviews.text: One of these got caught in my cat's throat and she was choking until I was able to grab it out with my fingers
customer_reviews.author: Caroline OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to this, but buy the larger size for dogs. Same product, just a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: My cat has IBD so we need be extremely careful about what she eats and she loves these! Literally yells at everyone until you give her one every morning and never seems to upset her stomach. Highly recommend to cats with sensitive tummies.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: The first package I bought would bring a stampede of paws when it was shaken. This package, some of the pieces seemed discoloured and my cat wouldn't eat any of it. She loves treats of nearly all kinds and loved the first package, but anything from this bag, she sniffs and ignores completely.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: It is crack for cats
customer_reviews.text: The pickiest cat in the world goes crazy for this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: I wish these were made from wild caught fish, ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were made from wild caught fish, I keep buying these because my cat loooves the taste of these.
customer_reviews.author: cucuyo

customer_reviews.title: And I feel good knowing that they are healthy for them
customer_reviews.text: I cats absolutely loves these treats! They both will do anything for them. And I feel good knowing that they are healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Delicious healthy treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for these treats. I appreciate that they are just dried salmon and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas F

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is produced in the USA so I ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is in heaven! We've never tried salmon and she went nuts! Love that this is produced in the USA so I don't have to worry!
customer_reviews.author: KAI:MOM

customer_reviews.title: 🐶 and 🐱 ❤️ these
customer_reviews.text: My kitty and doggie love these! I crumble the cubes onto their food.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Kratky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. Diabetic cat can have a treat now.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: They seem old
customer_reviews.text: Treats arrived fast on time but they are hard as a rock they should be soft I want to return these
customer_reviews.author: Deborah m toman

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved this Salmon one!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this! Also the chicken...they weren't much for the bison liver but I have doggie friends😀
customer_reviews.author: Pupawheelie

customer_reviews.title: Cat didn't like it.. At first!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were a bit too large. Cat didn't touch them unless I cut them way down.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Bstein

customer_reviews.title: these do make a good dog treat too
customer_reviews.text: The chunks are a little big for our cat, we break them up and our cat likes them, these do make a good dog treat too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them. These are the only treats he actually likes
customer_reviews.author: omplerch

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Love that the only ingredient is salmon & my fur babies love them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious Treat for Kitty
customer_reviews.text: A healthy treat for my cats. They like the salmon & chicken flavors best.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Seems to really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Just gave it to the kitten for 1st time. Seems to really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bijouxlover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat can't get enough, though it is a bit fishy smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My Cats LOOOOOVE These!
customer_reviews.text: My cats looooove these! Will make your hands smell like salmon but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Savannah LOVES this product. I wish they had discount pricing for purchasing in volume.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these and I don't feel so bad giving them treats.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It worked but left me with a very bad puncture wound on my finger
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! I normally order these types of treats from Dr. Fosters and Smith (past 7 years) . However they were on back order for a month. I decided to give these a try. These treats got stuck in my cat's throat immediately (which has never happened before). After a minute of my cat trying to cough it up, finally made the decision to pull it out myself. It worked but left me with a very bad puncture wound on my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Bicksler Soule

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes Crazy over the Salmon Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat just loves this product. He loves all of the Whole Life Pet Products. Even Venison. I received the package on time, maybe even early, from what i remember.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual treats, not good, very dry
customer_reviews.text: All treats were dry, this is not the same quality of treats I used to buy from Whole Life, me and my cats are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Saoud

customer_reviews.title: Too fishy, too crumbly.
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty didn't like the salmon either (also didn't like cod). It crumbles when you try to cut the large pieces. It also smells very fishy. I won't buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: Healthy treat for my teenage kittens. They enjoy it and look forward to the treat when they come in from a walk.

product_meta.title: Whole Life Pet Pure Salmon Freeze-Dried Cat Treats
product_meta.description:
Size:1oz.Whole Life Pure Salmon Originals Cat Treats 1oz

One Ingredient, Many Benefits
A single ingredient, protein rich, low calorie treat with intense natural 
flavor. Great for both dogs and cats. Pure protein treats are healthy for 
all pets and especially great for those who have food allergies or are 
prone to weight gain.

Designed as a healthy daily snack made from pure USDA Human Grade chicken 
breast that?s been gently steamed then freeze dried to lock in nutrients 
and concentrate natural flavors. Grain and gluten free and made without 
fillers, chemicals, additives or anything artificial.

* Human Grade
* Made In-House, In Small Batches
* Sourced In The USA
* Verified Safety With Every Batch

Ingredients: 100% Pure Salmon

Guaranteed Analysis:

Crude Protein: 52% Min
Crude Fat: 23% Min
Crude Fiber: 1% Max
Crude Moisture: 2% Max
feature_bullets: PURE HUMAN GRADE SALMON: Nothing but the best ingredients for your cat, these pure salmon fillet cat treats are sourced in the USA and are great as a snack or meal topper for your cat. Ideal for all cats or kittens and especially designed for training, to help finicky eaters, cats with gastro-intestinal issues or those who are overweight.

ONE SIMPLE INGREDIENT: These snacks have no added preservatives, chemicals, salts or artificial flavors, Just One Simple Ingredient 100% Pure Salmon Cat Treats are freeze dried to preserve the naturally rich protein snack. The foundation of a healthy diet starts with minimally processed, whole foods and treats.

QUALITY FIRST - THEY CAN'T CHOOSE, IT'S UP TO YOU: The most important decision you make as a pet parent is choosing what to feed. Every batch goes through rigorous quality and freshness tests going above and beyond USA regulations to ensure a verified safe product for your pet.

PROTEIN RICH CAT TREAT: Rich in protein and low in fat, this is a low calorie healthy cat treat that has been freeze dried to retain all of the quality protein found in naturally sourced Human Grade Wild Caught Salmon
MADE IN THE USA: US Sourced Salmon, Produced and Packaged in the USA, Made in house in Small Fresh Batches daily by our pet loving staff
